https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uZThp4eOJy4MoJeVsGa6NRadDb3.jpg The story of Nathan, a young teenager who tries to flourish in a romantic relationship with neighbour Roy. The two young men will have to face the brutal reality of the rural south of the United States in the late 1970s. Dream Boy
